page.title: 09Adults hobbies & pastimes
page.content:
Gardening,reading. Dad has no spare time,Mum reads. Fishing and shooting. Mum likes gardening and going to dress making classes 1km away and my Dad likes watching Presteigne football team playing. If we have any it's spent in gardening and going for walks and watching tv. Dad reads and does crosswords and mum reads, sews and likes gardening. We listen to music and read and we like cycling and mum likes sewing and gardening. Dad supports rugby and goes to Knighton or Cardiff to watch it and mum plays badminton and aerobics. Dad likes long hikes and mum likes gardening and we all like bike riding locally.
Typical responses from parents- many farmers deny having spare time- any they DO have seems to be spent watching tv!
